verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sintony aho,
Anilanao.
He, mitalaho,
Henoinao !
Eo irery ihany
No mamiko.
:,:Ny eto an-tany
Tsy mahafa-po.:,:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tompo malala,
Anilanao,
Eo tsy hiala,
Iriko izao.
Hahita indrindra
Ny tavanao,
:,:Mandra-pifindra
Any aminao.:,:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Eo re ny ratsy
Ho resiko.
Eo misy vatsy
Ho entiko.
Eo ny tomany
Ho tapitra.
:,:Eo izaho izany
Ho sambatra.:,:

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Tompo sintony
Akaikinao.
Tsy tiako intsony
Hiala aminao.
Ã”! tano mafy
Hanara-dia
:,:Ilay nihafy
Fony tety.:,:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Eny tsy ho ela
Hafoy ity,
Sady havela
Fa ho ary !
Hanatri-tava
'Lay Tompo tia
:,:Ho lalandava
Eny, doria.:,:
